Pre-Game Insights: England may no longer have to live in fear of penalty shootouts due to having a more experienced group of penalty takers.
Gareth Southgate emphasized the importance of having regular penalty takers for the team.
Harry Kane has made 15 penalties in a row since missing one against France in the 2022 World Cup.
Jude Bellingham has taken and scored penalties for Real Madrid this past season and hit the target in the team's Champions League shootout against Manchester City.
Ivan Toney has scored 30 penalties from 32 attempts in his pro career.
Bukayo Saka is a regular penalty taker with Arsenal, but did miss the final kick of the Euro 2020 final.
Phil Foden feels sorry for Gareth Southgate due to all the criticism he has been receiving.
The team has a lot more regular penalty takers for their clubs than they had three or four years ago.
The only shootout in the Round of 16 stage at Euro 2024 was dramatic, and unusual, with Portugal converting all three of its kicks and Slovenia's goalkeeper saving all three of Slovenia's kicks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The public annoyance back home is strong and impassioned due to England's unconvincing performances.
The sympathy for Gareth Southgate is nice, but the thing that would make England sorrier than anything would be getting knocked out on penalties yet again.
England has been so unconvincing to date that the public annoyance back home is strong and impassioned.
There is an antidote to England's penalty kick curse in theory, with the team having a more experienced group of penalty takers.
England has employed various strategies to prepare for penalty shootouts, including keeper Jordan Pickford picking up the ball and handing it to his teammate before the player kicks.
The team has a lot more regular penalty takers for their clubs than they had three or four years ago.

England's proficiency from 12 yards out might be the least of Gareth Southgate's worries, especially when paled up against his left-back conundrum, his holding midfielder conundrum, his Foden/Jude Bellingham conundrum, his Cole Palmer conundrum, and his which-conundrum-is-the-biggest-conundrum conundrum.
